item.description:
Come join us this Friday night at one of Boston's best kept secrets, District! This ultra-chill lounge has great music and atmosphere. A fun place to meet new people and to get your groove on! All members welcome, and feel free to bring a friend or two!

DETAILS: We will meet at 8:30pm in the bar area at Les Zygomates (129 South St in the Leather District by South Station, it is a French restaurant) We will head over to District around 10:00pm to beat the lines. Please meet us before 10pm, as you may not find us later. Expected cover: I do not believe there is a cover, but the key is to come early with the group. Expect to pay $10, but it should be less.

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.

District is an upscale venue, so please dress appropriately. If traveling by T, District is closest to South Station on the red line.

There is no baseball game on Friday, so hope to see you there! Charlie

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Mixing it up @ District, This Friday, Oct 26th!
